Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.core.util

Interface SecureContainer

All Known Subinterfaces:
SecureByteArray, SecureString
public interface SecureContainer
Base interface for all secure containers defining common functionality.
Since:
4.0

  • Method Details

    • wipe

      void wipe()
      Wipes the internal data and/or state of the secure object.

    • clone

      SecureContainer clone()
      Creates a clone of this secure container object.
      Note:
      It is implemented on the level of particular real containers and returns the appropriate object type. For instance, if this object is SecureString then it returns a new instance of secure string class.
      Returns:
      The clone of this secure container object whatever implementation it is.

    • equals

      boolean equals(Object data)
      Checks the content of the this secure container object equals to the specified other object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      data - The object to be compared to this object.
      Returns:
      If the two objects equal then true else false.

      Calculates the hash code of this secure container object.

      Returns:
